mutants.code:
import re

def text_to_word_list(text):
    text = re.sub('', '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    words = text.split()
    stop_words = ['the', 'and', 'a', 'an', 'in', 'on', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were', 'to', 'of', 'for', 'with', 'at']
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stop_words]
    return words

import re

def text_to_word_list(text):
    text = re.sub("[^\\w\\s\\'-]", 'MUTATED', text)
    text = text.lower()
    words = text.split()
    stop_words = ['the', 'and', 'a', 'an', 'in', 'on', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were', 'to', 'of', 'for', 'with', 'at']
    words = [word for word in words if word not in stop_words]
    return words

mutants.code:
import re

def text_to_word_list(text):
    text = re.sub("[^\\w\\s\\'-]", '', text)
    text = text.lower()
    words = text.split()
    stop_words = ['the', 'and', 'a', 'an', 'in', 'on', 'is', 'are', 'was', 'were', 'to', 'of', 'for', 'with', 'at']
    words = [word for word in words if word in stop_words]
    return words
